It's just, that's how grief is.

Well, one of the biggest things I think

is that everybody grieves differently.
And even within my own family, I have three sisters.

a year after my dad.
And how I grieve and how you grieve
is probably not the same,
but we have to make space for each other
because everyone processes it differently.

I was like protective of my dad's memory.

no, this is how he said that.

we can go through things and we can give things away.

And some people can feel kind of stuck in their grief.
Right? Yeah.
You know? Yes.

Like if you're holding your feelings in check all the time,
it's gonna stay longer as opposed to like,
the only way out is through.
